sentence.Network_en: Swithin drew his heels together, his deportment ever admirable.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯悦辛把脚跟并起,那种举止看上去更加神气.

sentence.Network_en: Swithin awoke; virtue had gone out of him.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯悦辛醒了过来; 莫不是碰上鬼了.

sentence.Network_en: According to his wishes Swithin was buried outside the cathedral.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据他的遗愿,把他埋到了教堂外面.

auth_sentence.content: Swithin drew his heels together, his deportment ever admirable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Swithin drew his heels together, his deportment ever admirable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Swithin drew his heels together, his deportment ever admirable.

auth_sentence.content: Swithin stared at her; a dusky orange dyed his cheeks.
auth_sentence.res_content: Swithin stared at her; a dusky orange dyed his cheeks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Swithin stared at her; a dusky orange dyed his cheeks.

auth_sentence.content: Only one miracle is attributed to Swithin while he was alive.
auth_sentence.res_content: Only one miracle is attributed to Swithin while he was alive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only one miracle is attributed to Swithin while he was alive.
